# Load Libraries

```{r load-packages}
pacman::p_load(ggplot2, readxl, ggbeeswarm, readr, dplyr, tidyr, tidyverse, devtools, cowplot, knitr, emmeans, lme4, lmerTest, RColorBrewer, viridis, install = FALSE)
```

# Load Data

```{r load-data}
aphid_choice_raw <- read_excel("data/alate_choice_in_vitro.xlsx") %>%
   mutate(block = as.factor(block))
```

## Filter per block

```{r filter-choice}
#block 1
aphid_choice_raw_block1 <- aphid_choice_raw %>%
  filter(block == "1")

#block 2
aphid_choice_raw_block2 <- aphid_choice_raw %>%
  filter(block == "2")

#block 3
aphid_choice_raw_block3 <- aphid_choice_raw %>%
  filter(block == "3")

#block 4
aphid_choice_raw_block4 <- aphid_choice_raw %>%
  filter(block == "4")
```
